summary: Unarmed combat, fit with one-handed tree.
descriptionHtml:
Hi guys, this is my first mod, so I'm excited to see the kind of feedback I'll be getting!
It simply adds in a new skill tree for unarmed combat in the One-handed skill tree.
There might be some bugs, so if you find any, please let me know.

SAVE-GAME FRIENDLY, BUT DON'T USE WITH OTHER MODS THAT EDIT ONE-HANDED TREE

DON'T GET 'MARTIAL STANCE,' AND 'MARTIAL TOUGHNESS' TOGETHER, they intentionally don't work together.

1.01:
Fixed a typo.
author: gateboy6
